code: import{createStore,combineReducers,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import thunk from'redux-thunk';import users from'./users.jsx';import ui from'./ui.jsx';var rootReducer=combineReducers({users:users,ui:ui});var enhancer;if(process.env.NODE_ENV==='production'){enhancer=applyMiddleware(thunk);}else{var logger=require('redux-logger').default;var composeEnhancers=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;enhancer=composeEnhancers(applyMiddleware(thunk,logger));}var configureStore=function configureStore(preloadedState){return createStore(rootReducer,preloadedState,enhancer);};export default configureStore;
